events.name: Conversations: The Artist and I
events.description:
Saturday, 16 Jan
2pm - 4pm
Expression Gallery, L4
Free admission

Join us in this exclusive Conversations: The Artist and I where artists from Prudential Eye Awards 2016 shortlist share how their personal experiences are expressed in their art form and how perspectives on current affairs influence their art and choice of medium. #ASMPrudentialEye

Programme 

2.00pm – 2.20pm Welcome and Overview of exhibition by Honor Harger and Niru Ratnam
2.20pm – 2.40pm Presentation by Huang Po-Chih
2.40pm – 3.00pm Presentation by indieguerillas
3.00pm – 3.20pm Presentation by Yang Mushi
3.20pm – 3.40pm Presentation by Sareth Svay
3.40pm – 4.00pm Q & A moderated by Honor Harger
4.00pm Event ends
